definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
lithosphere (in geology, the rigid crust of the earth)

sentences.english: Lafuma added a rubber toe strip to protect you from rocks and roots.
sentences.chinese: 拉弗马增加了橡胶脚趾地带，以保护您的岩石和根源。

sentences.english: He slowly climbed over the fallen rocks.
sentences.chinese: 他慢慢地爬过那些落下来的岩石。

sentences.english: These rocks have similar petrochemical compositions, mineral constituents and rock-forming tectonic settings.
sentences.chinese: 这些岩石有相近的岩石化学成分和成岩构造环境。

sentences.english: These rocks have similar petrochemical compositions, mineral constituents and rock-forming tectonic settings.
sentences.chinese: 这些岩石有相近的岩石化学成分和成岩构造环境。

sentences.english: They're trying to blast away the face of the rock.
sentences.chinese: 他们试图炸开岩石的表面。

sentences.english: When a dam is built, the accumulating water presses down upon the rock below.
sentences.chinese: 当大坝建成，逐渐积累的水压压向下方的岩石。

sentences.english: Stratigraphy studies the sequence of the rocks in the earth's crust .
sentences.chinese: 地层学研究地壳中岩石的层序。

sentences.english: The cold stone of the mysterious obelisk guards its secrets.
sentences.chinese: 神秘方尖塔上的冰冷岩石保守着它的秘密。

sentences.english: It was, for him, as though the rock were a giant hard door into another world.
sentences.chinese: 他觉得那岩石像是通往另外世界的一扇坚实大门。

sentences.english: A small piece of pottery under a rock might be a clue to the past.
sentences.chinese: 岩石下面的一小片儿瓷器可能就是研究过去的线索。

sentences.english: He discovered, on closer inspection, that the rocks contained gold.
sentences.chinese: 经过更为仔细的探察，他发现这些岩石含金。

sentences.english: They needed a bulldozer to dislodge the rock.
sentences.chinese: 他们需要一台推土机来挖出岩石。

sentences.english: Beyong her and far below is an immense rocky landscape.
sentences.chinese: 在离她更远更深的地方是一片巨大的岩石风景。

sentences.english: They drove a tunnel through the rock.
sentences.chinese: 他们凿通一条穿过岩石的隧道。

sentences.english: They placed dirt and rocks in a pan and then filled it about half way with water.
sentences.chinese: 他们在平底锅安置了土和岩石然后填装了一半。

sentences.english: The tectonic stress the Earth are mainly on the upper lithosphere.
sentences.chinese: 地球内部构造应力主要集中于岩石圈上层。

definition: variant of 岩層|岩层[yan2 ceng2]/rock strata
crushed or broken rock, stone etc
